title: One Piece Movie 1
synopsis: Woonan is the legendary Great Gold Pirate, earning the nickname after accumulating about 1/3 of the gold available in the world. Even after his disappearance, the tales of his gold being stashed away in a remote island continue to persist, a juicy target that other pirates lust for.
voices: ['Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Nakai, Kazuya', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Okamura, Akemi', 'Aono, Takeshi', 'Utsumi, Kenji', 'Imai, Yuka', 'Ohba, Mahito', 'Sakai, Tsurumaru']
staff: [['Shimizu, Junji', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Shimada, Michiru', ['Script']], ['Shimada, Shimada', ['Script']], ['Oda, Eiichiro', ['Original Creator']]]
